name: Indian Pop
description: Commonly based out of India, Pakistan and Bangladesh and almost always sung in Hindi, Urdu or Bengali, implements South Asian Music in context of American and European Pop and Rock music.

children.name: Bhojpuri Pop
children.description: Modernized pop-folk variant of Bhojpuri Folk Music.
